title: Skin Idea for Kha'Zix
body: Kha'Zix has a great  opportunity for a skin in that he looks similar to a Xenomorph. Do you guys think a skin redo of Kha'Zix in the "black alien" texture would be cool?

replies.body:
ok, this is a nice idea but if they are going to do it, they would ened to release a skin line. i Think the best possible skin line would be the Alien Invade skin line, follwing as heimerdinger in the mid lane, khasix in the JG as alien invader Kha'Zix with the whole (AVP look), then they would need a couple aother skins to fill the other roles. this skin in my opionion wouldnt be able to stand alone it would need to be in a group to have a higher effect. aswell as giving it a possibilty for standalone potential

ALIEN INVADER KHA'ZIX
ALIEN INVADER HEIMERDINGER
ALIEN INVADER TWITCH
ALIEN INVADER ZYRA ( like some weird organic metal take on zyra over the plant/ nature one)
ALIEN INVADER YORICK ( whole mothership sorta feel, its perfect for his new rework, his ulti could be a mother ship, and his ghoulds could be the generic aliens)
This is literally what Kha'zix and Rengar are based off of. Alien vs Predator.
fck yes that'd be so mint
